A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Ruined Star wars for me. Although it may be a good blockbuster film\, it is NOT a good STAR WARS film. The politics\, feminism and racism issues it touches on is not why I fell in love with Star wars. I fell in love with its simplicity and magic\, not this thing riddled with plot hole\, stale jokes and political themes Rian Jhonson calls a film. Dissapointing.
